Name: Lolly Joe
About the game: A dog's journey to reunite with his best friend. Lolly Joe is a 3D-platforming adventure that takes you through the surreal worlds inside a boy's subconscious mind. With his magic lollipop, Joe must overcome a variety of challenges crafted from his friend's dreams and memories. Explore vibrant, cartoon worlds inhabited by funny and strange creatures Challenging gameplay that put your platforming skills to the test An emotional story inspired by real world events Unlock 27 costumes and accessories to customize Joe's appearance in amusing ways Unique experience every time you play, with platforming challenges randomly varying on every run Fully playable with any Xinput-based game controller
Meta Title: Lolly Joe: Aug 5, 2016, Peter Valencia and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Lolly Joe? Check out the release date (Aug 5, 2016), developer insights from Peter Valencia, and a complete game summary.
